title: Pixel Repair Tool says unable to connect to USA unlocked Pixel 4a
content:
I bought an unlocked Pixel 4a from Best Buy back in 9/20. I use an AT&T prepaid plan. Yesterday morning, my phone shut off and won't get past the Google 'G' with a loading bar under it. Instead of factory resetting, I wanted to see if the Repair Tool could fix it. I followed the instructions exactly, but when it gets to the Connect your Pixel phase, I'm told its Unable to inspect.

I have tried every carrier provided for every country listed. Nothing works. I also tried popping out my sim card. It makes no difference. Again, this is an unlocked pixel purchased and used in the United States.



I did some googling, looks like my 4a is in a bootloop. I've let it run for 18 hours straight, and it will not get past the 'G'. I can't boot into recovery mode either. I hope this additional information is useful.
